messages.message:
Hey team, im trying to run search-tservice with the provisioner, but am running into this startup error
```2024/08/08 15:10:32 ERROR utils/status/status.go:182 -- [INTERNAL]: Failure during mkdir. Could not stat Path System/tmp/IndexService Err code = INTERNAL msg = Failure during stat.
2024/08/08 15:10:32 ERROR searchservice/index/handler/handler.go:121 -- [INTERNAL]: Failed to create storage dir (Err: rpc error: code = Internal desc = Failure during mkdir. Could not stat Path System/tmp/IndexService Err code = INTERNAL msg = Failure during stat.)
2024/08/08 15:10:32 FATAL searchservice/main.go:600 -- Failed to initialize index handler. Err: rpc error: code = Internal desc = Failed to create storage dir```
Seems like its having some issues checking dogfood FS?
Make sure file-service is up; if it is -- check the logs

Does this request/path look wrong in any way?
```2024/08/08 15:10:32 ERROR fileservice/handler/file.go:822 -- [INTERNAL]: Failure during mkdir. Could not stat Path System/tmp/IndexService Err code = INTERNAL msg = Failure during stat.
2024/08/08 15:10:32 ERROR fileservice/handler/file.go:321 -- [ERROR][mkdir] Username: system, Path: system/global/fs/Instabase Drive/System/tmp/IndexService, Err: rpc error: code = Internal desc = Failure during mkdir. Could not stat Path System/tmp/IndexService Err code = INTERNAL msg = Failure during stat., Time: 588ms, Size: 0Bytes```

Oh holdon its backed by S3, im going to take a deeper look
```2024/08/08 15:10:32 ERROR fileservice/clients/s3_client.go:374 -- Failure during stat. Path: 37c19bc6-5b57-4ba9-a252-49eacac2e174/System/tmp/IndexService Err: operation error S3: HeadObject, https response error StatusCode: 400, RequestID: GQDPPDQ5P34PYX7V, HostID: 5MLWEU63FVIPaON/HXv2EtNt2TUnV8mIi9xIGXL3JYz5CAQ2oe/INHxb+KRtRx+mk4Od2Xt4xTw=, api error BadRequest: Bad Request```
Yes, thats it thanks. (idk why slack search didnt find it lol). I am trying to use the new credentials shiqi posted now, will see if more changes are required
